about_the_game:
The show is far from over, and the haunted set has more secrets to reveal. In Mint's Hints 3, you’ll embark on a chilling journey to hunt down rogue androids, save the remaining ghostly friends, and uncover the truth behind your own mysterious past.

After a devastating betrayal, you find yourself at the center of a twisted game where the line between friend and foe blurs. The androids are stronger, more dangerous, and have their own dark motives. The remaining spirits of the once-loved characters are trapped, and it’s up to you to free them before they’re lost forever. But as you close in on the androids, you begin to encounter a ghost who seems to know more about you than you do yourself.

As mysteries unfold, you’ll have to question your own identity, your past, and the true nature of the show you once ran. Can you save your friends? Can you uncover the truth behind the androids? And, most importantly, can you trust yourself when your very existence is called into question?

Key Features:

  • Hunt down androids across creepy, abandoned sets and eerie environments.

  • Save the ghosts: Free the spirits of the show’s characters, each with their own tragic past.

  • Unravel your past: Uncover secrets that will change everything you thought you knew.

  • Solve mysteries: Solve intricate puzzles, uncover hidden clues, and navigate a world full of deceit.

  • Fight for survival: Face off against powerful androids and outsmart them with the help of friends you've made along the way.

Dive into this haunting sequel and get ready to search for hints — before it’s too late.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad-core Intel or AMD processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Includes settings to improve performance on low end PCs
